title: La Oruga
subtitle: The Caterpillar
meta_desc: Learn caterpillar vocabulary in Spanish with audio pronunciation. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, Spanish insects book, caterpillar Spanish, bilingual children books

pages.title: La Oruga
pages.prompt: A cute realistic green caterpillar on a leaf, plump and colorful, professional macro photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La oruga come hojas.
pages.prompt: A realistic caterpillar munching on a green leaf with bite marks visible, professional macro photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La oruga es larga.
pages.prompt: A long realistic caterpillar stretching across a branch, showing its full length and segments, professional macro photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La oruga tiene muchas patas.
pages.prompt: Close-up of a realistic caterpillar showing its many tiny legs gripping a stem, professional macro photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La oruga hace un capullo.
pages.prompt: A realistic chrysalis hanging from a branch, green and golden, transformation stage, professional macro photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La oruga se convierte en mariposa.
pages.prompt: A realistic butterfly emerging from its chrysalis, wings still unfolding, miracle of metamorphosis, professional macro photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.
